name: Kaspafunding
description: About KaspaFunding FUND $FUND is not just an ordinary KRC20 token. It is a community-driven initiative that provides support within the Kaspa and KRC20 ecosystems. This project boasts amazing, proven use cases, including a community center, meetups, startup support, and more. In a world dominated by memes, $FUND stands out as a project that is driving real change. Tokenomics-$FUND has a scarce circulating supply and a maximum supply of tokens. -Total Supply: 2,100,000 (2.1M) -Total Mints: 2,100 -Fair Launch -Community-Run Initiative $FUND uses ASIC mining hashrate to continually support decentralization, security, and Kaspa's infrastructure, while directly benefiting the $FUND community and the broader Kaspa ecosystem. Kaspafunding aims to grow and evolve into a store of value for the KRC20 ecosystem, with ongoing and developing partnerships with ASIC manufacturers, developers, and various cryptocurrency communities. FUND powers decentralized funding within the Kaspa ecosystem, supporting projects and initiatives with a proven use case. It’s more than a token; it’s a key player in advancing blockchain adoption and community-driven development. Fully backed by 250th and growing hash rate that directly creates a sustainable investing injection into the project and coin.
